title: microwave pasta primavera
instructions: Add pasta, water, olive oil, salt, and red onion to a large deep Anyday pot.
Mix and cook for 11 minutes at full power (1200W) uncovered.
Stir, then add asparagus and peas.
Cook for another 4 minutes uncovered, stirring at 2 minutes to ensure the pasta finishes cooking.
Remove from microwave and mix in yogurt and Parmesan.
Stir to combine, then let cool slightly for the sauce to set and thicken.
